case_title: Shera and 2 Others vs The State
case_number: Criminal Appeal No. 27 of 1977 and Jail Petition No. 49 of 1973

high_court_verdict.bench: Division Bench of Lahore High Court
high_court_verdict.decision: Convictions upheld for appellants; retrial ordered for Jahana, Dari, and Rasula.

key_evidence.motive: Revenge for the murder of Dari (father of Shera and Anara) in 1951.

defense_arguments.denial_of_involvement: Appellants claimed enmity over land ownership rights.
defense_arguments.alternative_motive: Suggested deceased was killed due to personal disputes involving his second wife.

majority_opinion.author: Muhammad Haleem
majority_opinion.summary: Ocular testimony corroborated by motive and medical evidence; appeal dismissed.

dissenting_opinion.author: Qaisar Khan
dissenting_opinion.summary: Ocular testimony unreliable; appellants acquitted due to benefit of doubt.

final_order: Appeal and Jail Petition dismissed in accordance with majority opinion.
